name: curious-router-rn
description: A plug and play file based routing library for React Native
author: Tahir Saeed

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/ && yarn build:esm && yarn build:cjs && yarn copy:generated-folder
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs/frontend --project tsconfig.frontend.json && tsc --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs/api --project tsconfig.api.json
scripts.build:dev: yarn cache clean && yarn build && yarn pack
scripts.copy:generated-folder: shx cp -R src/generated/ dist/esm/generated/ && shx cp -R src/generated/ dist/cjs/generated/
